name: tabby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also tabby cat) a cat that has dark-coloured marks on grey or brown fur: One of the cats is black and the other is a tabby. I have a four-month old tabby cat. Compare
calico
tortoiseshell
More examplesFewer examplesThe tabby lurked in the porch hopefully.The tabby cat is the most common colour form of all domestic breeds.There were black and white cats, ginger toms and tabbies prowling among the houses.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Felines (cats)
(of a cat or its fur) having dark-coloured marks on grey or brown fur: Our little tabby kitten has a wonderful purr. There were tufts of tabby fur on the carpet. Compare
calico
tortoiseshell
More examplesFewer examplesMy first cat was a tabby shorthair.The name "tiger cat" is sometimes used for a domestic cat with tabby colouration. The Scottish wildcat looks exactly the same as a barn cat with a mackerel tabby coat.
